actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title VI of the Public Health Service Act to provide that a facility for long-term care must comply with the Life Safety-Code in order to qualify for assistance thereunder.

summary.text: Provides that a facility for long-term care must comply with the Life Safety Code of the National Fire Protection Association in order to qualify for assistance under the Public Health Service Act. (Amends 42 U. S. C. 2910)

titles.title: A bill to amend title VI of the Public Health Service Act to provide that a facility for long-term care must comply with the Life Safety-Code in order to qualify for assistance thereunder.
